contexts.context: ...as once been something very rare, it has <mark>both</mark> been for Jews and for non-Jews alike...
.... However, one thing is for sure, <mark>both</mark> Russia and Japan stay armed and prepared for war....
...England and Amerika are also interested in Machuria and <mark>both</mark> support Japan in demanding Manchuria, which is actually...
...merchants. - Best of luck and development to <mark>both</mark> of them.
